localizedText.name: Name
localizedText.useReferenceTypesAsDefinitionNames: Use reference types as symbol names
localizedText.useNodeTypesAsDefinitionNames: Use node types as symbol names
localizedText.useNodeIdsAsDefinitionNames: Use node IDs as symbol names
localizedText.descAdvancedSettings: Advanced settings for datatype name translation
localizedText.descConnectionSettings: Connection details for the OPC-UA server
localizedText.descUseGlobalUaUser: The user configured here is logged in to the UA server, otherwise he logs in anonymously
localizedText.descForbiddenReferenceNodes: Reference node IDs, which must not be used as type ID
localizedText.descIgnoreNodes: Node Ids that are ignored when listing the symbols
localizedText.descStartPoint: Root node where the list of symbols starts
localizedText.descDefinitionNameMode: Changes the result of ListSymbols and how definition names are created. A setting based on ID based symbols can cause performance problems. Not all servers support unique reference types
localizedText.descTimeout: Specifies how long a connection is attempted or a read request can run before a timeout occurs
localizedText.MSG_UA_CREATE_DER_FAILED: No certificate could be created for {0}: {1}
localizedText.MSG_UA_CREATE_PEM_FAILED: No private key could be created for {0}: {1}
localizedText.MSG_UA_DELETE_FAILED: Certificate could not be deleted for {0}: {1}
